creator: dlopez4@fiu.edu
text: The link is for 2.2.23, but the file that is available is 2.2.22, so the link is pointing to a non-existent file.

creator: dlopez4@fiu.edu
text:
http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/

The directory listing here is how I figured out why the link was broken regardless of mirror.
*** Bug 53880 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text: *** Bug 53933 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Links are now against:
   http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/      (or mirror)
where the latest available binaries are stored.

These binaries may not be the latest version of apache, but they are the latest that have been built.

So there is no more broken links.



Moreover, you can pick a link from:
   http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/en/platform/windows.html#down

You can sometimes find here more up-to-date builds.
